00022 /**
00023  * @file   PmAdjusterFactory.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Wed Jan 11 14:42:45 2006
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Factory class for making chip streams based on a string
00028  * representation.
00029  */
00030 
00031 //
00032 #include "chipstream/PmAdjusterFactory.h"
00033 //
00034 #include "chipstream/GcAdjust.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/MmAdjust.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/PmSumAdjust.h"
00037 //
00038 #include "util/Convert.h"
00039 #include "util/Err.h"
00040 #include "util/Util.h"
00041 //
00042 
00043 using namespace std;
00044 
00045 /** 
00046  * @brief Constructor. Registers the objects we know how to create and how
00047  * they describe themselves.
00048  */  
00049 PmAdjusterFactory::PmAdjusterFactory() {
00050   // No adjustment
00051   m_Docs.push_back(PmOnlyAdjust::explainSelf());
00052   m_Creators.push_back(&PmOnlyAdjust::newObject);
00053   
00054   // MM adjustment
00055   m_Docs.push_back(MmAdjust::explainSelf());
00056   m_Creators.push_back(&MmAdjust::newObject);
00057 
00058   // GCBG adjustment
00059   m_Docs.push_back(GcAdjust::explainSelf());
00060   m_Creators.push_back(&GcAdjust::newObject);
00061 
00062   // PM Allele sum adjustment
00063   m_Docs.push_back(PmSumAdjust::explainSelf());
00064   m_Creators.push_back(&PmSumAdjust::newObject);
00065 }
00066 
00067 /** 
00068  * @brief Create a pointer to a new PmAdjuster object as described
00069  * in the string specification.
00070  * @param spec - Specification string i.e. pm-gcbg
00071  * 
00072  * @return Pointer to new PmAdjuster objects, must be deleted when
00073  * finished.
00074  */
00075 PmAdjuster *PmAdjusterFactory::adjusterForString(const std::string &spec) {
00076   PmAdjuster *stream = NULL;
00077   SelfCreate *create = NULL;
00078   create = SelfCreate::selfCreateFromString(spec, m_Docs, m_Creators, "PmAdjuster");
00079   /* Check class type. */
00080   if(InstanceOf(create, PmAdjuster)) {
00081     stream = static_cast<PmAdjuster *>(create);
00082   }
00083   else {
00084     Err::errAbort("Class doesn't appear to be of type PmAdjuster.");
00085   }
00086   return stream;
00087 }
00088 
00089 /** 
00090  * @brief Factory for creating PmAdjuster from string representation.
00091  * 
00092  * @param spec - Name of PmAdjuster.
00093  * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00094  * 
00095  * @return PmAdjuster requested.
00096  */
00097 PmAdjuster *PmAdjusterFactory::pmAdjusterForString(const std::string &spec, ChipLayout &layout) {
00098   PmAdjusterFactory factory;
00099   PmAdjuster *adjuster = factory.adjusterForString(spec);
00100   assert(adjuster);
00101   /* Some post processing for specific objects. */
00102   if(InstanceOf(adjuster, GcAdjust)) {
00103     if(m_GcControlProbes.empty()) 
00104       Err::errAbort("Must specify a .bgp file when using GcAdjust");
00105     static_cast<GcAdjust *>(adjuster)->setLayout(layout, m_GcControlProbes);
00106   }
00107   if(InstanceOf(adjuster, PmSumAdjust)) {
00108     static_cast<PmSumAdjust *>(adjuster)->setLayout(layout);
00109   }
00110   else if(InstanceOf(adjuster, MmAdjust)) {
00111     static_cast<MmAdjust *>(adjuster)->setLayout(layout);
00112   }
00113   return adjuster;
00114 }
00115 
00116 /** 
00117  * @brief Factory for creating PmAdjuster from string representation.
00118  * 
00119  * @param spec - Name of PmAdjuster.
00120  * @param board - Blackboard with various state info
00121  * 
00122  * @return PmAdjuster requested.
00123  */
00124 PmAdjuster *PmAdjusterFactory::pmAdjusterForString(const std::string &spec, PsBoard &board) { // ChipLayout &layout) {
00125   PmAdjusterFactory factory;
00126   PmAdjuster *adjuster = factory.adjusterForString(spec);
00127   assert(adjuster);
00128   /* Some post processing for specific objects. */
00129   adjuster->setParameters(board);
00130   return adjuster;
00131 }
